capital/theater/barmaid.about-bar:
There is no civilization without a place to gather after a long day.

When I joined Ashaven, this building was in ruins. But Wailing Tune and I saw what it could become. She needed a place to sing, and I needed a place to… bring some order to the chaos.
capital/theater/barmaid.about-bar-ask-singer: Wailing Tunes… is that the name of this singer ?
capital/theater/barmaid.about-cadence:
I didn't know her well. I just served her. But she…

No description would do her justice. She was more than a queen. She lit up every place she went, and her kindness was contagious.
capital/theater/barmaid.about-npc: I used to serve at Cadence Castle. Afternoon tea, state banquets… then it all fell apart.
capital/theater/barmaid.about-npc-more:
I wandered the wasteland, searching for a home. Crystal Den was a nightmare… the slavery, the brutality. The people there don't even know what 'thank you' means.

So, I turned back. And in the ruins, I found a voice. Wailing Tune.

Even amidst the ruins and the silence, it still sang.

She looks dreamily at Wailing Tune, who is singing on the other side of the bar.
capital/theater/barmaid.about-singer: Wailing Tune. Her voice once soothed high society. Today, it soothes lost souls.
capital/theater/barmaid.ask-about-bar: Your bar is impressive. How did you build such a place?
capital/theater/barmaid.ask-about-crystal-den: Is Crystal Den really so bad ?
capital/theater/barmaid.ask-about-npc: Have you always been a barmaid ?
capital/theater/barmaid.ask-about-singer: Before I order, who is singing?
capital/theater/barmaid.ask-about-still: A still ? How did he put one together ?
capital/theater/barmaid.ask-drink: A drink. What do you have?
capital/theater/barmaid.ask-drink-politely: Good evening. May I ask what you have to serve?
capital/theater/barmaid.back-to-intro: I see. Let's talk about something else.
capital/theater/barmaid.drinks: We have our own beer, brewed in-house using a still designed by Rotten Gear. A marvel of engineering, though its creator is… less refined.
capital/theater/barmaid.entry-exit: No thank you, I'm not drinking.
capital/theater/barmaid.exit-about-bar: A good bar is a home.
capital/theater/barmaid.exit-investigation-result: Anyway, let's talk about something else.
capital/theater/barmaid.ghoul-love-confirm-and-encourage: You should go talk to her, see for yourself.
capital/theater/barmaid.ghoul-love-confirm-feelings: She was as red as a tomato, and tried to deny it… it was adorable! But she finally admitted it.
capital/theater/barmaid.ghoul-love-inform-feelings: I know you didn't want me to get involved, but… she loves you too.
capital/theater/barmaid.ghoul-love-investigation-start: So I won't say anything… but I'll keep my ears peaked.
capital/theater/barmaid.ghoul-love-sure-about-suspicions: Whispering Ash? Are you sure this is more than friendship ?
capital/theater/barmaid.goul-love/feelings-confirmed:
Damn… after all these years, and it took a snooping smoothskin to make me find out.

Okay… okay. I'll have to… think about all this. But thanks, I guess.

And most importantly, keep it to yourself now, okay? I have my pride.
capital/theater/barmaid.goul-love/feelings-confirmed-and-encoura:
Talk to her, huh? Like it's that simple…

Maybe… Maybe I should. After all, it's not like we have eternity ahead of us…

You're the type to get involved in everything, aren't you? You must get along well with Broken Lens! But hey… maybe this time it wasn't such a bad idea.
capital/theater/barmaid.goul-love/feelings-revealed:
She… does she love me too?

By Celestia, I said I didn't want any indiscretions… and here you come with this!

I should be furious that you went snooping… but how could I be?

Are you sure about that? Did she tell you in person?
capital/theater/barmaid.goul-love/intro:
That's… a very direct question.

I care about her. More than I could express.

She hesitates, then continues in a confidential tone:

But I think she already loves someone else.
capital/theater/barmaid.goul-love/investigation-suggested:
No! Well… no. It's ridiculous. She doesn't need to know I'm asking myself these kinds of questions.

If she wants to talk to me about her feelings, she will. I'm not going to pry into her life.
capital/theater/barmaid.goul-love/suspicions:
I don't know. But… she spends a lot of time with Whispering Ash.

They have late-night talks, knowing silences… There's something between them, I'm sure of it.

And look at him. A former royal agent, mysterious, cultured, with a deep voice… How could I compete with that?
capital/theater/barmaid.introduction: Welcome to The Last Act. Here, courtesy is required, even at the ends of the earth. Sit down. What can I get you?
capital/theater/barmaid.love-ask-suspicions: And who do you think she's already in love with ?
capital/theater/barmaid.love-encourage-confession: Why not tell him how you feel ?
capital/theater/barmaid.love-encourage-confession-alt: Wailing Tune deserves to know how you feel.
capital/theater/barmaid.love-suggest-investigation: What if I tried to find out more, for you, discreetly ?
capital/theater/barmaid.singer-compliment: It's beautiful. Her voice is unique.
capital/theater/barmaid.singer-disrespect: Her voice is… hoarse. A little disturbing.
capital/theater/barmaid.singer-disrespected:
You smoothskin people can't understand.

We've seen centuries pass, we've lost more than you can imagine. His voice soothes our scars.

If that bothers you… no one's forcing you to stay.
capital/theater/barmaid.start-love-route: You stayed for her, didn't you ?
